title: [Sherlock] Design the 'Smart' Living Documentation Protocol
description: Design an intelligent update protocol where '_CONTEXT.md' files are explicitly linked to their corresponding manual chapters. This allows the Governor to enforce highly specific and low-cost documentation update checks.

acceptance_criteria.text: Update the design document to specify a metadata header in '_CONTEXT.md' files for linking (e.g., 'Manual-Chapter: <filename>').
Update the Governor's query to be specific, referencing the linked chapter found in the context file.
The design must detail how the Governor parses the '_CONTEXT.md' to find the linked chapter to validate.
